name: part_004
file: tmp_【 ＃百鬼あやめ生誕祭2024】Dream Festival‼ ～Nakiriayame 7th BirthDay～【百鬼あやめ⧸ホロライブ】 [d4l17lJKhDE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Ayame and Watame conclude their performance of 'DEAREST DROP'.
A transition graphic introducing the next guest, Usada Pekora, and the next segment.
Nakiri Ayame and Usada Pekora perform 'Do-Ki-Do-Ki!'.

subtitles.original: あなたをそばで
subtitles.english: I'll be watching you closely

subtitles.original: 見つめていよう
subtitles.english: from by your side.

subtitles.original: もしも 問いかけて 声は 風の中
subtitles.english: If I ask a question, my voice in the wind...

subtitles.original: 小さくなってく
subtitles.english: ...is fading away.

subtitles.original: すべてを 話してよ
subtitles.english: Tell me everything.

subtitles.original: そっと抱きしめてあげたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to hold you gently.

subtitles.original: なのに 流れる時間が示すのは
subtitles.english: And yet, what the passing time shows...

subtitles.original: ずれながら遠ざかる二人
subtitles.english: ...is the two of us drifting apart.

subtitles.original: どうしたら あなたに愛を刻めるの
subtitles.english: How can I engrave my love into you?

subtitles.original: いつだって心は愛を止められない
subtitles.english: My heart can never stop loving.

subtitles.original: 何を探しているの
subtitles.english: What are you looking for?

subtitles.original: 強い思いで今を守りたくなった
subtitles.english: With strong feelings, I wanted to protect the present.

subtitles.original: 理由は あなたをもっと見ていたくて
subtitles.english: The reason is that I wanted to see more of you,

subtitles.original: 空に溶け去るまでは
subtitles.english: until it melts away into the sky.

subtitles.original: 流れ星空へと打ち返す
subtitles.english: I'll hit back shooting stars towards the sky!

subtitles.original: ドゥノット、ウォーリー
subtitles.english: Do not, worry!

subtitles.original: ホームラン かぐや姫が叫ぶ
subtitles.english: Home run! Princess Kaguya screams.

subtitles.original: 9回裏のストーリー
subtitles.english: A story from the bottom of the 9th.

subtitles.original: 驚いたUFOが落ちてく
subtitles.english: A surprised UFO is falling down.

subtitles.original: やりすぎ！？アイアムソーリー
subtitles.english: Did I overdo it!? I'm sorry.

subtitles.original: 目が覚めてティーチャーが微笑んだ
subtitles.english: I woke up and the teacher was smiling.

subtitles.original: 絶体絶命！？
subtitles.english: A desperate situation!?

subtitles.original: 充電がフルになるまで
subtitles.english: Until my charge is full,

subtitles.original: あと少し夢見てたいな
subtitles.english: I want to dream just a little more.

subtitles.original: 胸の中 ウサギとカメが
subtitles.english: Inside my heart, the tortoise and the hare...

subtitles.original: ずっと競争している
subtitles.english: ...are racing forever.

subtitles.original: ドンと来いだよ
subtitles.english: Bring it on!

subtitles.original: ハンデありのノンフィクション
subtitles.english: A non-fiction with a handicap.

subtitles.original: いま いま この瞬間が
subtitles.english: Now, now, this very moment...

subtitles.original: スタート切るチャンスなんだ
subtitles.english: ...is the chance to start.

subtitles.original: ドンと来いだよ
subtitles.english: Bring it on!

subtitles.original: 気合入れてこんぷくしよう
subtitles.english: Let's get fired up and 'Kon-puku'!

subtitles.original: ほら ほら もうあっというま
subtitles.english: Look, look, it's already over in a flash.

subtitles.original: 大逆転しちゃうもんね
subtitles.english: I'm gonna make a huge comeback!

subtitles.original: 飛べ 飛べ もうちょい高く
subtitles.english: Fly, fly, a little higher!

subtitles.original: 行け 行け もうちょい遠く
subtitles.english: Go, go, a little further!

subtitles.original: 君と私 本気出せれば
subtitles.english: If you and I get serious,

subtitles.original: 限界なんてちょちょいのちょいと
subtitles.english: limits are no problem at all!
Let's fly at 1000%!

subtitles.original: お弁当 海の玉手箱〜
subtitles.english: A lunch box, a treasure chest from the sea...

subtitles.original: それなら宝石箱や〜
subtitles.english: Well then, it's a jewelry box!

subtitles.original: どんぶらこ デザート流れて来い
subtitles.english: Tumbling down, let the dessert float this way.

subtitles.original: 桃でもケーキでもいいの
subtitles.english: Whether it's peaches or cake, it's fine.

subtitles.original: 食べすぎて まぶたが落ちてく
subtitles.english: I ate too much, my eyelids are falling.

subtitles.original: 相撲で勝負だスイマ
subtitles.english: Let's have a sumo match, sleepiness.

subtitles.original: 目が覚めてティーチャーが微笑んだ
subtitles.english: I woke up and the teacher was smiling.

subtitles.original: いのっ・こりっ・ね
subtitles.english: Stay behind after class, okay?

subtitles.original: 世界中 巻き込みながら
subtitles.english: While involving the whole world,

subtitles.original: 好きなだけ遊びたいな
subtitles.english: I want to play as much as I like.

subtitles.original: 楽しいが一番！
subtitles.english: Fun is number one!

subtitles.original: 100年後 100万年後には
subtitles.english: 100 years later, 1,000,000 years later...

subtitles.original: 昔ばなしに乗っけてよ
subtitles.english: ...put us in a fairy tale.

subtitles.original: ドン詰まりこぽ
subtitles.english: Stuck in a dead end, 'kopo'.

subtitles.original: 無敵になるモチベーション
subtitles.english: Motivation to become invincible.

subtitles.original: 来た来た来た この感覚が
subtitles.english: It's here, it's here, this feeling...

subtitles.original: また頑張れる合図なんだ
subtitles.english: ...is the sign that I can keep going.

subtitles.original: ドン詰まりこぽ
subtitles.english: Stuck in a dead end, 'kopo'.

subtitles.original: 笑顔見せて行くぞのぞの
subtitles.english: Let's go with a smile...
